channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Expert Invoice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Expert Invoice

item.title: CVE-2024-5172|2024-06-18T13:49:52.876Z -- unknown -- expert%20invoice
item.description: The Expert Invoice WordPress plugin through 1.0.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-5172|2024-06-18T06:00:02.523Z -- unknown -- expert%20invoice
item.description: The Expert Invoice WordPress plugin through 1.0.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
